The claim originated from the website As: which is known for publishing fake news and does not have a disclaimer notice.
The Food and Drug Administration: FDA) did pass regulations in early 2015 requiring manufacturers of electronic cigarettes to submit marketing applications for their products, but there was no ban on all e-juice for electronic cigarettes effective July 2016.
The FDA provided a two: year window for impacted companies to submit their applications and allowed them to continue selling the products under review during this period.
